object.property: Specify exact path including command line options. '%i' will be replaced with the mount point of the iPod.
Specify exact path including command line options. '%i' will be replaced with the mount point of the iPod.
Specify exact path including command line options. '%i' will be replaced with the mount point of the iPod.
On startup automatically sync with playlist directories
Directories to sync with are determined from the filenames of the tracks in the playlist.
On startup automatically sync with the directory:
Delete missing tracks from the iPod or repository

Normally, if a track is no longer present in the sync directory, it will be removed from the playlist, but not from the iPod or local repository. If this option is checked, tracks will be completely removed from the iPod or local repository, unless the track is a member of other playlists as well. NOTE: if you sync with the master playlist, you must check this option if you want tracks to be removed, because removing from the master playlist means removing from the iPod.
Confirm before removing tracks from the iPod or repository
Will show a list of tracks removed and a list of tracks newly added or updated.
Specify exact path including command line options. '%i' will be replaced with the mount point of the iPod.
Please select mountpoint and your iPod model
Note: Only directories that do not already exist will be created.
